Home --> Documentations --> PJSIP Reference

PJSUA

This is the reference implementation for PJSIP and PJMEDIA. PJSUA is a console based application, designed to be simple enough to be readble, but powerful enough to demonstrate all features available in PJSIP and PJMEDIA.

This file is pjsip-apps/src/pjsua/pjsua_app.c

Screenshot on WinXP:

pjsua on WinXP

53 static void ringback_start(pjsua_call_id call_id);
54 static void ring_start(pjsua_call_id call_id);
55 static void ring_stop(pjsua_call_id call_id);

64  * Configuration manipulation

67 /*****************************************************************************
68  * Callback
69  */
70 static void ringback_start(pjsua_call_id call_id)
71 {
72  if (app_config.no_tones)
73  return;
74 
75  if (app_config.call_data[call_id].ringback_on)
76  return;
77 
78  app_config.call_data[call_id].ringback_on = PJ_TRUE;
79 
80  if (++app_config.ringback_cnt==1 &&
81  app_config.ringback_slot!=PJSUA_INVALID_ID)
82  {
83  pjsua_conf_connect(app_config.ringback_slot, 0);
84  }
85 }
86 
87 static void ring_stop(pjsua_call_id call_id)
88 {
89  if (app_config.no_tones)
90  return;
91 
92  if (app_config.call_data[call_id].ringback_on) {
93  app_config.call_data[call_id].ringback_on = PJ_FALSE;
94 
95  pj_assert(app_config.ringback_cnt>0);
96  if (--app_config.ringback_cnt == 0 &&
97  app_config.ringback_slot!=PJSUA_INVALID_ID)
98  {
99  pjsua_conf_disconnect(app_config.ringback_slot, 0);
100  pjmedia_tonegen_rewind(app_config.ringback_port);
101  }
102  }
103 
104  if (app_config.call_data[call_id].ring_on) {
105  app_config.call_data[call_id].ring_on = PJ_FALSE;
106 
107  pj_assert(app_config.ring_cnt>0);
108  if (--app_config.ring_cnt == 0 &&
109  app_config.ring_slot!=PJSUA_INVALID_ID)
110  {
111  pjsua_conf_disconnect(app_config.ring_slot, 0);
112  pjmedia_tonegen_rewind(app_config.ring_port);
113  }
114  }
115 }
116 
117 static void ring_start(pjsua_call_id call_id)
118 {
119  if (app_config.no_tones)
120  return;
121 
122  if (app_config.call_data[call_id].ring_on)
123  return;
124 
125  app_config.call_data[call_id].ring_on = PJ_TRUE;
126 
127  if (++app_config.ring_cnt==1 &&
128  app_config.ring_slot!=PJSUA_INVALID_ID)
129  {
130  pjsua_conf_connect(app_config.ring_slot, 0);
131  }
132 }
133 
134 /* Callback from timer when the maximum call duration has been
135  * exceeded.
136  */
137 static void call_timeout_callback(pj_timer_heap_t *timer_heap,
138  struct pj_timer_entry *entry)
139 {
140  pjsua_call_id call_id = entry->id;
141  pjsua_msg_data msg_data_;
142  pjsip_generic_string_hdr warn;
143  pj_str_t hname = pj_str("Warning");
144  pj_str_t hvalue = pj_str("399 pjsua \"Call duration exceeded\"");
145 
146  PJ_UNUSED_ARG(timer_heap);
147 
148  if (call_id == PJSUA_INVALID_ID) {
149  PJ_LOG(1,(THIS_FILE, "Invalid call ID in timer callback"));
150  return;
151  }
152 
153  /* Add warning header */
154  pjsua_msg_data_init(&msg_data_);
155  pjsip_generic_string_hdr_init2(&warn, &hname, &hvalue);
156  pj_list_push_back(&msg_data_.hdr_list, &warn);
157 
158  /* Call duration has been exceeded; disconnect the call */
159  PJ_LOG(3,(THIS_FILE, "Duration (%d seconds) has been exceeded "
160  "for call %d, disconnecting the call",
161  app_config.duration, call_id));
162  entry->id = PJSUA_INVALID_ID;
163  pjsua_call_hangup(call_id, 200, NULL, &msg_data_);
164 }
165 
166 
167 /* General processing for media state. "mi" is the media index */
168 static void on_call_generic_media_state(pjsua_call_info *ci, unsigned mi,
169  pj_bool_t *has_error)
170 {
171  const char *status_name[] = {
172  "None",
173  "Active",
174  "Local hold",
175  "Remote hold",
176  "Error"
177  };
178 
179  PJ_UNUSED_ARG(has_error);
180 
181  pj_assert(ci->media[mi].status <= PJ_ARRAY_SIZE(status_name));
182  pj_assert(PJSUA_CALL_MEDIA_ERROR == 4);
183 
184  PJ_LOG(4,(THIS_FILE, "Call %d media %d [type=%s], status is %s",
185  ci->id, mi, pjmedia_type_name(ci->media[mi].type),
186  status_name[ci->media[mi].status]));
187 }
188 
189 /* Process audio media state. "mi" is the media index. */
190 static void on_call_audio_state(pjsua_call_info *ci, unsigned mi,
191  pj_bool_t *has_error)
192 {
193  PJ_UNUSED_ARG(has_error);
194 
195  /* Stop ringback */
196  ring_stop(ci->id);
197 
198  /* Connect ports appropriately when media status is ACTIVE or REMOTE HOLD,
199  * otherwise we should NOT connect the ports.
200  */
201  if (ci->media[mi].status == PJSUA_CALL_MEDIA_ACTIVE ||
202  ci->media[mi].status == PJSUA_CALL_MEDIA_REMOTE_HOLD)
203  {
204  pj_bool_t connect_sound = PJ_TRUE;
205  pj_bool_t disconnect_mic = PJ_FALSE;
206  pjsua_conf_port_id call_conf_slot;
207 
208  call_conf_slot = ci->media[mi].stream.aud.conf_slot;
209 
210  /* Loopback sound, if desired */
211  if (app_config.auto_loop) {
212  pjsua_conf_connect(call_conf_slot, call_conf_slot);
213  connect_sound = PJ_FALSE;
214  }
215 
216  /* Automatically record conversation, if desired */
217  if (app_config.auto_rec && app_config.rec_port != PJSUA_INVALID_ID) {
218  pjsua_conf_connect(call_conf_slot, app_config.rec_port);
219  }
220 
221  /* Stream a file, if desired */
222  if ((app_config.auto_play || app_config.auto_play_hangup) &&
223  app_config.wav_port != PJSUA_INVALID_ID)
224  {
225  pjsua_conf_connect(app_config.wav_port, call_conf_slot);
226  connect_sound = PJ_FALSE;
227  }
228 
229  /* Stream AVI, if desired */
230  if (app_config.avi_auto_play &&
231  app_config.avi_def_idx != PJSUA_INVALID_ID &&
232  app_config.avi[app_config.avi_def_idx].slot != PJSUA_INVALID_ID)
233  {
234  pjsua_conf_connect(app_config.avi[app_config.avi_def_idx].slot,
235  call_conf_slot);
236  disconnect_mic = PJ_TRUE;
237  }
238 
239  /* Put call in conference with other calls, if desired */
240  if (app_config.auto_conf) {
241  pjsua_call_id call_ids[PJSUA_MAX_CALLS];
242  unsigned call_cnt=PJ_ARRAY_SIZE(call_ids);
243  unsigned i;
244 
245  /* Get all calls, and establish media connection between
246  * this call and other calls.
247  */
248  pjsua_enum_calls(call_ids, &call_cnt);
249 
250  for (i=0; i<call_cnt; ++i) {
251  if (call_ids[i] == ci->id)
252  continue;
253 
254  if (!pjsua_call_has_media(call_ids[i]))
255  continue;
256 
257  pjsua_conf_connect(call_conf_slot,
258  pjsua_call_get_conf_port(call_ids[i]));
259  pjsua_conf_connect(pjsua_call_get_conf_port(call_ids[i]),
260  call_conf_slot);
261 
262  /* Automatically record conversation, if desired */
263  if (app_config.auto_rec && app_config.rec_port !=
264  PJSUA_INVALID_ID)
265  {
266  pjsua_conf_connect(pjsua_call_get_conf_port(call_ids[i]),
267  app_config.rec_port);
268  }
269 
270  }
271 
272  /* Also connect call to local sound device */
273  connect_sound = PJ_TRUE;
274  }
275 
276  /* Otherwise connect to sound device */
277  if (connect_sound) {
278  pjsua_conf_connect(call_conf_slot, 0);
279  if (!disconnect_mic)
280  pjsua_conf_connect(0, call_conf_slot);
281 
282  /* Automatically record conversation, if desired */
283  if (app_config.auto_rec && app_config.rec_port != PJSUA_INVALID_ID)
284  {
285  pjsua_conf_connect(call_conf_slot, app_config.rec_port);
286  pjsua_conf_connect(0, app_config.rec_port);
287  }
288  }
289  }
290 }
291 
292 /* Process video media state. "mi" is the media index. */
293 static void on_call_video_state(pjsua_call_info *ci, unsigned mi,
294  pj_bool_t *has_error)
295 {
296  if (ci->media_status != PJSUA_CALL_MEDIA_ACTIVE)
297  return;
298 
299  arrange_window(ci->media[mi].stream.vid.win_in);
300 
301  PJ_UNUSED_ARG(has_error);
302 }
303 
304 
305 /* On 1
306  * Handler when invite state has changed.
307  */
308 static void on_call_state(
309  pjsua_call_id call_id,
310  pjsip_event *e)
311 {
312  pjsua_call_info call_info;
313 
314  PJ_UNUSED_ARG(e);
315 
316  pjsua_call_get_info(call_id, &call_info);
317 
318  if (call_info.state == PJSIP_INV_STATE_DISCONNECTED) {
319 
320  /* Stop all ringback for this call */
321  ring_stop(call_id);
322 
323  /* Cancel duration timer, if any */
324  if (app_config.call_data[call_id].timer.id != PJSUA_INVALID_ID) {
325  app_call_data *cd = &app_config.call_data[call_id];
326  pjsip_endpoint *endpt = pjsua_get_pjsip_endpt();
327 
328  cd->timer.id = PJSUA_INVALID_ID;
329  pjsip_endpt_cancel_timer(endpt, &cd->timer);
330  }
331 
332  /* Rewind play file when hangup automatically,
333  * since file is not looped
334  */
335  if (app_config.auto_play_hangup)
336  pjsua_player_set_pos(app_config.wav_id, 0);
337 
338 
339  PJ_LOG(3,(THIS_FILE, "Call %d is DISCONNECTED [reason=%d (%s)]",
340  call_id,
341  call_info.last_status,
342  call_info.last_status_text.ptr));
343 
344  if (call_id == current_call) {
345  find_next_call();
346  }
347 
348  /* Dump media state upon disconnected */
349  if (1) {
350  PJ_LOG(5,(THIS_FILE,
351  "Call %d disconnected, dumping media stats..",
352  call_id));
353  log_call_dump(call_id);
354  }
355 
356  } else {
357 
358  if (app_config.duration != PJSUA_APP_NO_LIMIT_DURATION &&
359  call_info.state == PJSIP_INV_STATE_CONFIRMED)
360  {
361  /* Schedule timer to hangup call after the specified duration */
362  app_call_data *cd = &app_config.call_data[call_id];
363  pjsip_endpoint *endpt = pjsua_get_pjsip_endpt();
364  pj_time_val delay;
365 
366  cd->timer.id = call_id;
367  delay.sec = app_config.duration;
368  delay.msec = 0;
369  pjsip_endpt_schedule_timer(endpt, &cd->timer, &delay);
370  }
371 
372  if (call_info.state == PJSIP_INV_STATE_EARLY) {
373  int code;
374  pj_str_t reason;
375  pjsip_msg *msg;
376 
377  /* This can only occur because of TX or RX message */
378  pj_assert(e->type == PJSIP_EVENT_TSX_STATE);
379 
380  if (e->body.tsx_state.type == PJSIP_EVENT_RX_MSG) {
381  msg = e->body.tsx_state.src.rdata->msg_info.msg;
382  } else {
383  msg = e->body.tsx_state.src.tdata->msg;
384  }
385 
386  code = msg->line.status.code;
387  reason = msg->line.status.reason;
388 
389  /* Start ringback for 180 for UAC unless there's SDP in 180 */
390  if (call_info.role==PJSIP_ROLE_UAC && code==180 &&
391  msg->body == NULL &&
392  call_info.media_status==PJSUA_CALL_MEDIA_NONE)
393  {
394  ringback_start(call_id);
395  }
396 
397  PJ_LOG(3,(THIS_FILE, "Call %d state changed to %s (%d %.*s)",
398  call_id, call_info.state_text.ptr,
399  code, (int)reason.slen, reason.ptr));
400  } else {
401  PJ_LOG(3,(THIS_FILE, "Call %d state changed to %s",
402  call_id,
403  call_info.state_text.ptr));
404  }
405 
406  if (current_call==PJSUA_INVALID_ID)
407  current_call = call_id;
408 
409  }
410 }
411 
412 /* On 2
413  * Callback on media state changed event.
414  * The action may connect the call to sound device, to file, or
415  * to loop the call.
416  */
417 static void on_call_media_state(
418  pjsua_call_id call_id)
419 {
420  pjsua_call_info call_info;
421  unsigned mi;
422  pj_bool_t has_error = PJ_FALSE;
423 
424  pjsua_call_get_info(call_id, &call_info);
425 
426  for (mi=0; mi<call_info.media_cnt; ++mi) {
427  on_call_generic_media_state(&call_info, mi, &has_error);
428 
429  switch (call_info.media[mi].type) {
430  case PJMEDIA_TYPE_AUDIO:
431  on_call_audio_state(&call_info, mi, &has_error);
432  break;
433  case PJMEDIA_TYPE_VIDEO:
434  on_call_video_state(&call_info, mi, &has_error);
435  break;
436  default:
437  /* Make gcc happy about enum not handled by switch/case */
438  break;
439  }
440  }
441 
442  if (has_error) {
443  pj_str_t reason = pj_str("Media failed");
444  pjsua_call_hangup(call_id, 500, &reason, NULL);
445  }
446 
447 #if PJSUA_HAS_VIDEO
448  /* Check if remote has just tried to enable video */
449  if (call_info.rem_offerer && call_info.rem_vid_cnt)
450  {
451  int vid_idx;
452 
453  /* Check if there is active video */
454  vid_idx = pjsua_call_get_vid_stream_idx(call_id);
455  if (vid_idx == -1 || call_info.media[vid_idx].dir == PJMEDIA_DIR_NONE) {
456  PJ_LOG(3,(THIS_FILE,
457  "Just rejected incoming video offer on call %d, "
458  "use \"vid call enable %d\" or \"vid call add\" to "
459  "enable video!", call_id, vid_idx));
460  }
461  }
462 #endif
463 }
464 
465 /* On 3
466  * Handler when there is incoming call.
467  */
468 static void on_incoming_call(
469  pjsua_acc_id acc_id,
470  pjsua_call_id call_id,
471  pjsip_rx_data *rdata)
472 {
473  pjsua_call_info call_info;
474 
475  PJ_UNUSED_ARG(acc_id);
476  PJ_UNUSED_ARG(rdata);
477 
478  pjsua_call_get_info(call_id, &call_info);
479 
480  if (current_call==PJSUA_INVALID_ID)
481  current_call = call_id;
482 
483 #ifdef USE_GUI
484  if (!showNotification(call_id))
485  return;
486 #endif
487 
488  /* Start ringback */
489  ring_start(call_id);
490 
491  if (app_config.auto_answer > 0) {
492  pjsua_call_setting opt;
493 
494  pjsua_call_setting_default(&opt);
495  opt.aud_cnt = app_config.aud_cnt;
496  opt.vid_cnt = app_config.vid.vid_cnt;
497 
498  pjsua_call_answer2(call_id, &opt, app_config.auto_answer, NULL,
499  NULL);
500  }
501 
502  if (app_config.auto_answer < 200) {
503  char notif_st[80] = {0};
504 
505 #if PJSUA_HAS_VIDEO
506  if (call_info.rem_offerer && call_info.rem_vid_cnt) {
507  snprintf(notif_st, sizeof(notif_st),
508  "To %s the video, type \"vid %s\" first, "
509  "before answering the call!\n",
510  (app_config.vid.vid_cnt? "reject":"accept"),
511  (app_config.vid.vid_cnt? "disable":"enable"));
512  }
513 #endif
514 
515  PJ_LOG(3,(THIS_FILE,
516  "Incoming call for account %d!\n"
517  "Media count: %d audio & %d video\n"
518  "%s"
519  "From: %s\n"
520  "To: %s\n"
521  "Press %s to answer or %s to reject call",
522  acc_id,
523  call_info.rem_aud_cnt,
524  call_info.rem_vid_cnt,
525  notif_st,
526  call_info.remote_info.ptr,
527  call_info.local_info.ptr,
528  (app_config.use_cli?"ca a":"a"),
529  (app_config.use_cli?"g":"h")));
530  }
531 }
532 
533 /* On 4
534  * Handler when a transaction within a call has changed state.
535  */
536 static void on_call_tsx_state(
537  pjsua_call_id call_id,
538  pjsip_transaction *tsx,
539  pjsip_event *e)
540 {
541  const pjsip_method info_method =
542  {
543  PJSIP_OTHER_METHOD,
544  { "INFO", 4 }
545  };
546 
547  if (pjsip_method_cmp(&tsx->method, &info_method)==0) {
548  /*
549  * Handle INFO method.
550  */
551  const pj_str_t STR_APPLICATION = { "application", 11};
552  const pj_str_t STR_DTMF_RELAY = { "dtmf-relay", 10 };
553  pjsip_msg_body *body = NULL;
554  pj_bool_t dtmf_info = PJ_FALSE;
555 
556  if (tsx->role == PJSIP_ROLE_UAC) {
557  if (e->body.tsx_state.type == PJSIP_EVENT_TX_MSG)
558  body = e->body.tsx_state.src.tdata->msg->body;
559  else
560  body = e->body.tsx_state.tsx->last_tx->msg->body;
561  } else {
562  if (e->body.tsx_state.type == PJSIP_EVENT_RX_MSG)
563  body = e->body.tsx_state.src.rdata->msg_info.msg->body;
564  }
565 
566  /* Check DTMF content in the INFO message */
567  if (body && body->len &&
568  pj_stricmp(&body->content_type.type, &STR_APPLICATION)==0 &&
569  pj_stricmp(&body->content_type.subtype, &STR_DTMF_RELAY)==0)
570  {
571  dtmf_info = PJ_TRUE;
572  }
573 
574  if (dtmf_info && tsx->role == PJSIP_ROLE_UAC &&
575  (tsx->state == PJSIP_TSX_STATE_COMPLETED ||
576  (tsx->state == PJSIP_TSX_STATE_TERMINATED &&
577  e->body.tsx_state.prev_state != PJSIP_TSX_STATE_COMPLETED)))
578  {
579  /* Status of outgoing INFO request */
580  if (tsx->status_code >= 200 && tsx->status_code < 300) {
581  PJ_LOG(4,(THIS_FILE,
582  "Call %d: DTMF sent successfully with INFO",
583  call_id));
584  } else if (tsx->status_code >= 300) {
585  PJ_LOG(4,(THIS_FILE,
586  "Call %d: Failed to send DTMF with INFO: %d/%.*s",
587  call_id,
588  tsx->status_code,
589  (int)tsx->status_text.slen,
590  tsx->status_text.ptr));
591  }
592  } else if (dtmf_info && tsx->role == PJSIP_ROLE_UAS &&
593  tsx->state == PJSIP_TSX_STATE_TRYING)
594  {
595  /* Answer incoming INFO with 200/OK */
596  pjsip_rx_data *rdata;
597  pjsip_tx_data *tdata;
598  pj_status_t status;
599 
600  rdata = e->body.tsx_state.src.rdata;
601 
602  if (rdata->msg_info.msg->body) {
603  status = pjsip_endpt_create_response(tsx->endpt, rdata,
604  200, NULL, &tdata);
605  if (status == PJ_SUCCESS)
606  status = pjsip_tsx_send_msg(tsx, tdata);
607 
608  PJ_LOG(3,(THIS_FILE, "Call %d: incoming INFO:\n%.*s",
609  call_id,
610  (int)rdata->msg_info.msg->body->len,
611  rdata->msg_info.msg->body->data));
612  } else {
613  status = pjsip_endpt_create_response(tsx->endpt, rdata,
614  400, NULL, &tdata);
615  if (status == PJ_SUCCESS)
616  status = pjsip_tsx_send_msg(tsx, tdata);
617  }
618  }
619  }
620 }
621 
622 /* On 5
623  * DTMF callback.
624  */
625 static void call_on_dtmf_callback(
626  pjsua_call_id call_id,
627  int dtmf)
628 {
629  PJ_LOG(3,(THIS_FILE, "Incoming DTMF on call %d: %c", call_id, dtmf));
630 }
631 
632 /* On 6
633  * Redirection handler.
634  */
635 static pjsip_redirect_op call_on_redirected(
636  pjsua_call_id call_id,
637  const pjsip_uri *target,
638  const pjsip_event *e)
639 {
640  PJ_UNUSED_ARG(e);
641 
642  if (app_config.redir_op == PJSIP_REDIRECT_PENDING) {
643  char uristr[PJSIP_MAX_URL_SIZE];
644  int len;
645 
646  len = pjsip_uri_print(PJSIP_URI_IN_FROMTO_HDR, target, uristr,
647  sizeof(uristr));
648  if (len < 1) {
649  pj_ansi_strcpy(uristr, "--URI too long--");
650  }
651 
652  PJ_LOG(3,(THIS_FILE, "Call %d is being redirected to %.*s. "
653  "Press 'Ra' to accept+replace To header, 'RA' to accept, "
654  "'Rr' to reject, or 'Rd' to disconnect.",
655  call_id, len, uristr));
656  }
657 
658  return app_config.redir_op;
659 }

669  // Log already written.

717 /* On 10
718  * Subscription state has changed.
719  */
720 static void on_buddy_evsub_state(
721  pjsua_buddy_id buddy_id,
722  pjsip_evsub *sub,
723  pjsip_event *event)
724 {

726

728 
729  event_info[0] = '\0';
730

732  event->body.tsx_state.type == PJSIP_EVENT_RX_MSG)
733  {
734  pjsip_rx_data *rdata = event->body.tsx_state.src.rdata;
735  snprintf(event_info, sizeof(event_info),
736  " (RX %s)",
737  pjsip_rx_data_get_info(rdata));
738  }
739 
740  PJ_LOG(4,(THIS_FILE,
741  "Buddy %d: subscription state: %s (event: %s%s)",
742  buddy_id, pjsip_evsub_get_state_name(sub),
743  pjsip_event_str(event->type),
744  event_info));
745 
746 }

790 /* On 13
791  * Call transfer request status.
792  */
793 static void on_call_transfer_status(
794  pjsua_call_id call_id,
795  int status_code,
796  const pj_str_t *status_text,
797  pj_bool_t final,
798  pj_bool_t *p_cont)
799 {
800  PJ_LOG(3,(THIS_FILE, "Call %d: transfer status=%d (%.*s) %s",
801  call_id, status_code,
802  (int)status_text->slen, status_text->ptr,
803  (final ? "[final]" : "")));
804 
805  if (status_code/100 == 2) {
806  PJ_LOG(3,(THIS_FILE,
807  "Call %d: call transferred successfully, disconnecting call",
808  call_id));
809  pjsua_call_hangup(call_id, PJSIP_SC_GONE, NULL, NULL);
810  *p_cont = PJ_FALSE;
811  }
812 }

814 /* On 14
815  * Notification that call is being replaced.
816  */
817 static void on_call_replaced(
818  pjsua_call_id old_call_id,
819  pjsua_call_id new_call_id)
820 {
821  pjsua_call_info old_ci, new_ci;
822 
823  pjsua_call_get_info(old_call_id, &old_ci);
824  pjsua_call_get_info(new_call_id, &new_ci);
825 
826  PJ_LOG(3,(THIS_FILE, "Call %d with %.*s is being replaced by "
827  "call %d with %.*s",
828  old_call_id,
829  (int)old_ci.remote_info.slen, old_ci.remote_info.ptr,
830  new_call_id,
831  (int)new_ci.remote_info.slen, new_ci.remote_info.ptr));
832 }

834 /* On 15
835  * NAT type detection callback.
836  */
837 static void on_nat_detect(
838  const pj_stun_nat_detect_result *res)
839 {
840  if (res->status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
841  pjsua_perror(THIS_FILE, "NAT detection failed", res->status);
842  } else {
843  PJ_LOG(3, (THIS_FILE, "NAT detected as %s", res->nat_type_name));
844  }
845 }

847 /* On 16
848  * MWI indication
849  */
850 static void on_mwi_info(
851  pjsua_acc_id acc_id,
852  pjsua_mwi_info *mwi_info)
853 {
854  pj_str_t body;
855 
856  PJ_LOG(3,(THIS_FILE, "Received MWI for acc %d:", acc_id));
857 
858  if (mwi_info->rdata->msg_info.ctype) {
859  const pjsip_ctype_hdr *ctype = mwi_info->rdata->msg_info.ctype;
860 
861  PJ_LOG(3,(THIS_FILE, " Content-Type: %.*s/%.*s",
862  (int)ctype->media.type.slen,
863  ctype->media.type.ptr,
864  (int)ctype->media.subtype.slen,
865  ctype->media.subtype.ptr));
866  }
867 
868  if (!mwi_info->rdata->msg_info.msg->body) {
869  PJ_LOG(3,(THIS_FILE, " no message body"));
870  return;
871  }
872 
873  body.ptr = (char *)mwi_info->rdata->msg_info.msg->body->data;
874  body.slen = mwi_info->rdata->msg_info.msg->body->len;
875 
876  PJ_LOG(3,(THIS_FILE, " Body:\n%.*s", (int)body.slen, body.ptr));
877 }
878 
879 /* On 17
880  * Transport status notification
881  */
882 static void on_transport_state(
883  pjsip_transport *tp,
884  pjsip_transport_state state,
885  const pjsip_transport_state_info *info)
886 {
887  char host_port[128];
888 
889  pj_ansi_snprintf(host_port, sizeof(host_port), "[%.*s:%d]",
890  (int)tp->remote_name.host.slen,
891  tp->remote_name.host.ptr,
892  tp->remote_name.port);
893 
894  switch (state) {
895  case PJSIP_TP_STATE_CONNECTED:
896  {
897  PJ_LOG(3,(THIS_FILE, "SIP %s transport is connected to %s",
898  tp->type_name, host_port));
899  }
900  break;
901 
902  case PJSIP_TP_STATE_DISCONNECTED:
903  {
904  char buf[100];
905 
906  snprintf(buf, sizeof(buf), "SIP %s transport is disconnected "
907  "from %s", tp->type_name, host_port);
908  pjsua_perror(THIS_FILE, buf, info->status);
909  }
910  break;
911 
912  default:
913  break;
914  }
915 
916 #if defined(PJSIP_HAS_TLS_TRANSPORT) && PJSIP_HAS_TLS_TRANSPORT!=0
917 
918  if (!pj_ansi_stricmp(tp->type_name, "tls") && info->ext_info &&
919  (state == PJSIP_TP_STATE_CONNECTED ||
920  ((pjsip_tls_state_info*)info->ext_info)->
921  ssl_sock_info->verify_status != PJ_SUCCESS))
922  {
923  pjsip_tls_state_info *tls_info = (pjsip_tls_state_info*)info->ext_info;
924  pj_ssl_sock_info *ssl_sock_info = tls_info->ssl_sock_info;
925  char buf[2048];
926  const char *verif_msgs[32];
927  unsigned verif_msg_cnt;
928 
929  /* Dump server TLS cipher */
930  PJ_LOG(4,(THIS_FILE, "TLS cipher used: 0x%06X/%s",
931  ssl_sock_info->cipher,
932  pj_ssl_cipher_name(ssl_sock_info->cipher) ));
933 
934  /* Dump server TLS certificate */
935  pj_ssl_cert_info_dump(ssl_sock_info->remote_cert_info, " ",
936  buf, sizeof(buf));
937  PJ_LOG(4,(THIS_FILE, "TLS cert info of %s:\n%s", host_port, buf));
938 
939  /* Dump server TLS certificate verification result */
940  verif_msg_cnt = PJ_ARRAY_SIZE(verif_msgs);
941  pj_ssl_cert_get_verify_status_strings(ssl_sock_info->verify_status,
942  verif_msgs, &verif_msg_cnt);
943  PJ_LOG(3,(THIS_FILE, "TLS cert verification result of %s : %s",
944  host_port,
945  (verif_msg_cnt == 1? verif_msgs[0]:"")));
946  if (verif_msg_cnt > 1) {
947  unsigned i;
948  for (i = 0; i < verif_msg_cnt; ++i)
949  PJ_LOG(3,(THIS_FILE, "- %s", verif_msgs[i]));
950  }
951 
952  if (ssl_sock_info->verify_status &&
953  !app_config.udp_cfg.tls_setting.verify_server)
954  {
955  PJ_LOG(3,(THIS_FILE, "PJSUA is configured to ignore TLS cert "
956  "verification errors"));
957  }
958  }
959 
960 #endif
961 
962 }
963

965  * Notification on ICE error.

968  int index,

976  "ICE keep alive failure for transport %d", index));
977 }

979 /* On 19

993 /* On 20
994  * install-tl-windows.bat --profile installation.profile
995  * Callback on media events
996  */
997 static void on_call_media_event(
998  pjsua_call_id call_id,
999  unsigned med_idx,
1000  pjmedia_event *event)
1001 {
1002  char event_name[5];
1003 
1004  PJ_LOG(5,(THIS_FILE, "Event %s",
1005  pjmedia_fourcc_name(event->type, event_name)));
1006 
1007 #if PJSUA_HAS_VIDEO
1008  if (event->type == PJMEDIA_EVENT_FMT_CHANGED) {
1009  /* Adjust renderer window size to original video size */
1010  pjsua_call_info ci;
1011 
1012  pjsua_call_get_info(call_id, &ci);
1013 
1014  if ((ci.media[med_idx].type == PJMEDIA_TYPE_VIDEO) &&
1015  (ci.media[med_idx].dir & PJMEDIA_DIR_DECODING))
1016  {
1017  pjsua_vid_win_id wid;
1018  pjmedia_rect_size size;
1019  pjsua_vid_win_info win_info;
1020 
1021  wid = ci.media[med_idx].stream.vid.win_in;
1022  pjsua_vid_win_get_info(wid, &win_info);
1023 
1024  size = event->data.fmt_changed.new_fmt.det.vid.size;
1025  if (size.w != win_info.size.w || size.h != win_info.size.h) {
1026  pjsua_vid_win_set_size(wid, &size);
1027 
1028  /* Re-arrange video windows */
1029  arrange_window(PJSUA_INVALID_ID);
1030  }
1031  }
1032  }
1033 #else
1034  PJ_UNUSED_ARG(call_id);
1035  PJ_UNUSED_ARG(med_idx);
1036  PJ_UNUSED_ARG(event);
1037 #endif
1038 }

1040 #ifdef TRANSPORT_ADAPTER_SAMPLE
1041 /*
1042  * This callback is called when media transport needs to be created.
1043  */
1044 static pjmedia_transport* on_create_media_transport(pjsua_call_id call_id,
1045  unsigned media_idx,
1046  pjmedia_transport *base_tp,
1047  unsigned flags)
1048 {
1049  pjmedia_transport *adapter;
1050  pj_status_t status;
1051 
1052  /* Create the adapter */
1053  status = pjmedia_tp_adapter_create(pjsua_get_pjmedia_endpt(),
1054  NULL, base_tp,
1055  (flags & PJSUA_MED_TP_CLOSE_MEMBER),
1056  &adapter);
1057  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
1058  PJ_PERROR(1,(THIS_FILE, status, "Error creating adapter"));
1059  return NULL;
1060  }
1061 
1062  PJ_LOG(3,(THIS_FILE, "Media transport is created for call %d media %d",
1063  call_id, media_idx));
1064 
1065  return adapter;
1066 }

1068 
1069 /* Playfile done notification, set timer to hangup calls */
1070 pj_status_t on_playfile_done(pjmedia_port *port, void *usr_data)
1071 {
1072  pj_time_val delay;
1073 
1074  PJ_UNUSED_ARG(port);
1075  PJ_UNUSED_ARG(usr_data);
1076 
1077  /* Just rewind WAV when it is played outside of call */
1078  if (pjsua_call_get_count() == 0) {
1079  pjsua_player_set_pos(app_config.wav_id, 0);
1080  return PJ_SUCCESS;
1081  }
1082 
1083  /* Timer is already active */
1084  if (app_config.auto_hangup_timer.id == 1)
1085  return PJ_SUCCESS;
1086 
1087  app_config.auto_hangup_timer.id = 1;
1088  delay.sec = 0;
1089  delay.msec = 200; /* Give 200 ms before hangup */
1090  pjsip_endpt_schedule_timer(pjsua_get_pjsip_endpt(),
1091  &app_config.auto_hangup_timer,
1092  &delay);
1093 
1094  return PJ_SUCCESS;
1095 }
1096 
1097 /* Auto hangup timer callback */
1098 static void hangup_timeout_callback(pj_timer_heap_t *timer_heap,
1099  struct pj_timer_entry *entry)
1100 {
1101  PJ_UNUSED_ARG(timer_heap);
1102  PJ_UNUSED_ARG(entry);
1103 
1104  app_config.auto_hangup_timer.id = 0;
1105  pjsua_call_hangup_all();
1106 }
1107 
1108 /*
1109  * A simple registrar, invoked by default_mod_on_rx_request()
1110  */
1111 static void simple_registrar(pjsip_rx_data *rdata)
1112 {
1113  pjsip_tx_data *tdata;
1114  const pjsip_expires_hdr *exp;
1115  const pjsip_hdr *h;
1116  unsigned cnt = 0;
1117  pjsip_generic_string_hdr *srv;
1118  pj_status_t status;
1119 
1120  status = pjsip_endpt_create_response(pjsua_get_pjsip_endpt(),
1121  rdata, 200, NULL, &tdata);
1122  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS)
1123  return;
1124 
1125  exp = (pjsip_expires_hdr *)pjsip_msg_find_hdr(rdata->msg_info.msg,
1126  PJSIP_H_EXPIRES, NULL);
1127 
1128  h = rdata->msg_info.msg->hdr.next;
1129  while (h != &rdata->msg_info.msg->hdr) {
1130  if (h->type == PJSIP_H_CONTACT) {
1131  const pjsip_contact_hdr *c = (const pjsip_contact_hdr*)h;
1132  int e = c->expires;
1133 
1134  if (e < 0) {
1135  if (exp)
1136  e = exp->ivalue;
1137  else
1138  e = 3600;
1139  }
1140 
1141  if (e > 0) {
1142  pjsip_contact_hdr *nc = (pjsip_contact_hdr *)pjsip_hdr_clone(
1143  tdata->pool, h);
1144  nc->expires = e;
1145  pjsip_msg_add_hdr(tdata->msg, (pjsip_hdr*)nc);
1146  ++cnt;
1147  }
1148  }
1149  h = h->next;
1150  }
1151 
1152  srv = pjsip_generic_string_hdr_create(tdata->pool, NULL, NULL);
1153  srv->name = pj_str("Server");
1154  srv->hvalue = pj_str("pjsua simple registrar");
1155  pjsip_msg_add_hdr(tdata->msg, (pjsip_hdr*)srv);
1156 
1157  pjsip_endpt_send_response2(pjsua_get_pjsip_endpt(),
1158  rdata, tdata, NULL, NULL);
1159 }
1160 
1161 /*****************************************************************************
1162  * A simple module to handle otherwise unhandled request. We will register
1163  * this with the lowest priority.
1164  */
1165 
1166 /* Notification on incoming request */
1167 static pj_bool_t default_mod_on_rx_request(pjsip_rx_data *rdata)
1168 {
1169  pjsip_tx_data *tdata;
1170  pjsip_status_code status_code;
1171  pj_status_t status;
1172 
1173  /* Don't respond to ACK! */
1174  if (pjsip_method_cmp(&rdata->msg_info.msg->line.req.method,
1175  &pjsip_ack_method) == 0)
1176  return PJ_TRUE;
1177 
1178  /* Simple registrar */
1179  if (pjsip_method_cmp(&rdata->msg_info.msg->line.req.method,
1180  &pjsip_register_method) == 0)
1181  {
1182  simple_registrar(rdata);
1183  return PJ_TRUE;
1184  }
1185 
1186  /* Create basic response. */
1187  if (pjsip_method_cmp(&rdata->msg_info.msg->line.req.method,
1188  &pjsip_notify_method) == 0)
1189  {
1190  /* Unsolicited NOTIFY's, send with Bad Request */
1191  status_code = PJSIP_SC_BAD_REQUEST;
1192  } else {
1193  /* Probably unknown method */
1194  status_code = PJSIP_SC_METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED;
1195  }
1196  status = pjsip_endpt_create_response(pjsua_get_pjsip_endpt(),
1197  rdata, status_code,
1198  NULL, &tdata);
1199  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
1200  pjsua_perror(THIS_FILE, "Unable to create response", status);
1201  return PJ_TRUE;
1202  }
1203 
1204  /* Add Allow if we're responding with 405 */
1205  if (status_code == PJSIP_SC_METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED) {
1206  const pjsip_hdr *cap_hdr;
1207  cap_hdr = pjsip_endpt_get_capability(pjsua_get_pjsip_endpt(),
1208  PJSIP_H_ALLOW, NULL);
1209  if (cap_hdr) {
1210  pjsip_msg_add_hdr(tdata->msg, (pjsip_hdr *)pjsip_hdr_clone(
1211  tdata->pool, cap_hdr));
1212  }
1213  }
1214 
1215  /* Add User-Agent header */
1216  {
1217  pj_str_t user_agent;
1218  char tmp[80];
1219  const pj_str_t USER_AGENT = { "User-Agent", 10};
1220  pjsip_hdr *h;
1221 
1222  pj_ansi_snprintf(tmp, sizeof(tmp), "PJSUA v%s/%s",
1223  pj_get_version(), PJ_OS_NAME);
1224  pj_strdup2_with_null(tdata->pool, &user_agent, tmp);
1225 
1226  h = (pjsip_hdr*) pjsip_generic_string_hdr_create(tdata->pool,
1227  &USER_AGENT,
1228  &user_agent);
1229  pjsip_msg_add_hdr(tdata->msg, h);
1230  }
1231 
1232  pjsip_endpt_send_response2(pjsua_get_pjsip_endpt(), rdata, tdata,
1233  NULL, NULL);
1234 
1235  return PJ_TRUE;
1236 }
1237 
1238 /* The module instance. */
1239 static pjsip_module mod_default_handler =
1240 {
1241  NULL, NULL, /* prev, next. */
1242  { "mod-default-handler", 19 }, /* Name. */
1243  -1, /* Id */
1244  PJSIP_MOD_PRIORITY_APPLICATION+99, /* Priority */
1245  NULL, /* load() */
1246  NULL, /* start() */
1247  NULL, /* stop() */
1248  NULL, /* unload() */
1249  &default_mod_on_rx_request, /* on_rx_request() */
1250  NULL, /* on_rx_response() */
1251  NULL, /* on_tx_request. */
1252  NULL, /* on_tx_response() */
1253  NULL, /* on_tsx_state() */
1254 
1255 };
1256 
1259 /* Called on CLI (re)started, e.g: initial start, after iOS bg */
1260 void cli_on_started(pj_status_t status)
1261 {
1262  /* Notify app */
1263  if (app_cfg.on_started) {
1264  if (status == PJ_SUCCESS) {
1265  char info[128];
1266  cli_get_info(info, sizeof(info));
1267  if (app_cfg.on_started) {
1268  (*app_cfg.on_started)(status, info);
1269  }
1270  } else {
1271  if (app_cfg.on_started) {
1272  (*app_cfg.on_started)(status, NULL);
1273  }
1274  }
1275  }
1276 }
1277 
1278 /* Called on CLI quit */
1279 void cli_on_stopped(pj_bool_t restart, int argc, char* argv[])
1280 {
1281  /* Notify app */
1282  if (app_cfg.on_stopped)
1283  (*app_cfg.on_stopped)(restart, argc, argv);
1284 }
1285 
1286 
1287 /* Called on pjsua legacy quit */
1288 void legacy_on_stopped(pj_bool_t restart)
1289 {
1290  /* Notify app */
1291  if (app_cfg.on_stopped)
1292  (*app_cfg.on_stopped)(restart, 1, NULL);
1293 }
1294 
1295 /*****************************************************************************
1296  * Public API
1297  */
1298 
1299 int stdout_refresh_proc(void *arg)
1300 {
1301  extern char *stdout_refresh_text;
1302 
1303  PJ_UNUSED_ARG(arg);
1304 
1305  /* Set thread to lowest priority so that it doesn't clobber
1306  * stdout output
1307  */
1308  pj_thread_set_prio(pj_thread_this(),
1309  pj_thread_get_prio_min(pj_thread_this()));
1310 
1311  while (!stdout_refresh_quit) {
1312  pj_thread_sleep(stdout_refresh * 1000);
1313  puts(stdout_refresh_text);
1314  fflush(stdout);
1315  }
1316 
1317  return 0;
1318 }
1319 
1320 static pj_status_t app_init()
1321 {
1322  pjsua_transport_id transport_id = -1;
1323  pjsua_transport_config tcp_cfg;
1324  unsigned i;
1325  pj_pool_t *tmp_pool;
1326  pj_status_t status;
1327 
1329  status = pjsua_create();
1330  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS)
1331  return status;
1332 
1333  /* Create pool for application */
1334  app_config.pool = pjsua_pool_create("pjsua-app", 1000, 1000);
1335  tmp_pool = pjsua_pool_create("tmp-pjsua", 1000, 1000);;
1336 
1337  /* Init CLI & its FE settings */
1338  if (!app_running) {
1339  pj_cli_cfg_default(&app_config.cli_cfg.cfg);
1340  pj_cli_telnet_cfg_default(&app_config.cli_cfg.telnet_cfg);
1341  pj_cli_console_cfg_default(&app_config.cli_cfg.console_cfg);
1342  app_config.cli_cfg.telnet_cfg.on_started = cli_on_started;
1343  }
1344 
1346  status = load_config(app_cfg.argc, app_cfg.argv, &uri_arg);
1347  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
1348  pj_pool_release(tmp_pool);
1349  return status;
1350  }
1351 
1352  /* Initialize application callbacks */
1353  app_config.cfg.cb.on_call_state = &on_call_state;
1354  app_config.cfg.cb.on_call_media_state = &on_call_media_state;
1355  app_config.cfg.cb.on_incoming_call = &on_incoming_call;
1356  app_config.cfg.cb.on_call_tsx_state = &on_call_tsx_state;
1357  app_config.cfg.cb.on_dtmf_digit = &call_on_dtmf_callback;
1358  app_config.cfg.cb.on_call_redirected = &call_on_redirected;
1359  app_config.cfg.cb.on_reg_state = &on_reg_state;
1360  app_config.cfg.cb.on_incoming_subscribe = &on_incoming_subscribe;
1361  app_config.cfg.cb.on_buddy_state = &on_buddy_state;
1362  app_config.cfg.cb.on_buddy_evsub_state = &on_buddy_evsub_state;
1363  app_config.cfg.cb.on_pager = &on_pager;
1364  app_config.cfg.cb.on_typing = &on_typing;
1365  app_config.cfg.cb.on_call_transfer_status = &on_call_transfer_status;
1366  app_config.cfg.cb.on_call_replaced = &on_call_replaced;
1367  app_config.cfg.cb.on_nat_detect = &on_nat_detect;
1368  app_config.cfg.cb.on_mwi_info = &on_mwi_info;
1369  app_config.cfg.cb.on_transport_state = &on_transport_state;
1370  app_config.cfg.cb.on_ice_transport_error = &on_ice_transport_error;
1371  app_config.cfg.cb.on_snd_dev_operation = &on_snd_dev_operation;
1372  app_config.cfg.cb.on_call_media_event = &on_call_media_event;
1373 #ifdef TRANSPORT_ADAPTER_SAMPLE
1374  app_config.cfg.cb.on_create_media_transport = &on_create_media_transport;
1375 #endif
1376 
1377  /* Set sound device latency */
1378  if (app_config.capture_lat > 0)
1379  app_config.media_cfg.snd_rec_latency = app_config.capture_lat;
1380  if (app_config.playback_lat)
1381  app_config.media_cfg.snd_play_latency = app_config.playback_lat;
1382 
1383  if (app_cfg.on_config_init)
1384  (*app_cfg.on_config_init)(&app_config);
1385 
1386  /* Initialize pjsua */
1387  status = pjsua_init(&app_config.cfg, &app_config.log_cfg,
1388  &app_config.media_cfg);
1389  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
1390  pj_pool_release(tmp_pool);
1391  return status;
1392  }
1393 
1394  /* Initialize our module to handle otherwise unhandled request */
1395  status = pjsip_endpt_register_module(pjsua_get_pjsip_endpt(),
1396  &mod_default_handler);
1397  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS)
1398  return status;
1399 
1400 #ifdef STEREO_DEMO
1401  stereo_demo();
1402 #endif
1403 
1404  /* Initialize calls data */
1405  for (i=0; i<PJ_ARRAY_SIZE(app_config.call_data); ++i) {
1406  app_config.call_data[i].timer.id = PJSUA_INVALID_ID;
1407  app_config.call_data[i].timer.cb = &call_timeout_callback;
1408  }
1409 
1410  /* Optionally registers WAV file */
1411  for (i=0; i<app_config.wav_count; ++i) {
1412  pjsua_player_id wav_id;
1413  unsigned play_options = 0;
1414 
1415  if (app_config.auto_play_hangup)
1416  play_options |= PJMEDIA_FILE_NO_LOOP;
1417 
1418  status = pjsua_player_create(&app_config.wav_files[i], play_options,
1419  &wav_id);
1420  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS)
1421  goto on_error;
1422 
1423  if (app_config.wav_id == PJSUA_INVALID_ID) {
1424  app_config.wav_id = wav_id;
1425  app_config.wav_port = pjsua_player_get_conf_port(app_config.wav_id);
1426  if (app_config.auto_play_hangup) {
1427  pjmedia_port *port;
1428 
1429  pjsua_player_get_port(app_config.wav_id, &port);
1430  status = pjmedia_wav_player_set_eof_cb(port, NULL,
1431  &on_playfile_done);
1432  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS)
1433  goto on_error;
1434 
1435  pj_timer_entry_init(&app_config.auto_hangup_timer, 0, NULL,
1436  &hangup_timeout_callback);
1437  }
1438  }
1439  }
1440 
1441  /* Optionally registers tone players */
1442  for (i=0; i<app_config.tone_count; ++i) {
1443  pjmedia_port *tport;
1444  char name[80];
1445  pj_str_t label;
1446  pj_status_t status2;
1447 
1448  pj_ansi_snprintf(name, sizeof(name), "tone-%d,%d",
1449  app_config.tones[i].freq1,
1450  app_config.tones[i].freq2);
1451  label = pj_str(name);
1452  status2 = pjmedia_tonegen_create2(app_config.pool, &label,
1453  8000, 1, 160, 16,
1454  PJMEDIA_TONEGEN_LOOP, &tport);
1455  if (status2 != PJ_SUCCESS) {
1456  pjsua_perror(THIS_FILE, "Unable to create tone generator", status);
1457  goto on_error;
1458  }
1459 
1460  status2 = pjsua_conf_add_port(app_config.pool, tport,
1461  &app_config.tone_slots[i]);
1462  pj_assert(status2 == PJ_SUCCESS);
1463 
1464  status2 = pjmedia_tonegen_play(tport, 1, &app_config.tones[i], 0);
1465  pj_assert(status2 == PJ_SUCCESS);
1466  }
1467 
1468  /* Optionally create recorder file, if any. */
1469  if (app_config.rec_file.slen) {
1470  status = pjsua_recorder_create(&app_config.rec_file, 0, NULL, 0, 0,
1471  &app_config.rec_id);
1472  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS)
1473  goto on_error;
1474 
1475  app_config.rec_port = pjsua_recorder_get_conf_port(app_config.rec_id);
1476  }
1477 
1478  pj_memcpy(&tcp_cfg, &app_config.udp_cfg, sizeof(tcp_cfg));
1479 
1480  /* Create ringback tones */
1481  if (app_config.no_tones == PJ_FALSE) {
1482  unsigned samples_per_frame;
1483  pjmedia_tone_desc tone[RING_CNT+RINGBACK_CNT];
1484  pj_str_t name;
1485 
1486  samples_per_frame = app_config.media_cfg.audio_frame_ptime *
1487  app_config.media_cfg.clock_rate *
1488  app_config.media_cfg.channel_count / 1000;
1489 
1490  /* Ringback tone (call is ringing) */
1491  name = pj_str("ringback");
1492  status = pjmedia_tonegen_create2(app_config.pool, &name,
1493  app_config.media_cfg.clock_rate,
1494  app_config.media_cfg.channel_count,
1495  samples_per_frame,
1496  16, PJMEDIA_TONEGEN_LOOP,
1497  &app_config.ringback_port);
1498  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS)
1499  goto on_error;
1500 
1501  pj_bzero(&tone, sizeof(tone));
1502  for (i=0; i<RINGBACK_CNT; ++i) {
1503  tone[i].freq1 = RINGBACK_FREQ1;
1504  tone[i].freq2 = RINGBACK_FREQ2;
1505  tone[i].on_msec = RINGBACK_ON;
1506  tone[i].off_msec = RINGBACK_OFF;
1507  }
1508  tone[RINGBACK_CNT-1].off_msec = RINGBACK_INTERVAL;
1509 
1510  pjmedia_tonegen_play(app_config.ringback_port, RINGBACK_CNT, tone,
1511  PJMEDIA_TONEGEN_LOOP);
1512 
1513 
1514  status = pjsua_conf_add_port(app_config.pool, app_config.ringback_port,
1515  &app_config.ringback_slot);
1516  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS)
1517  goto on_error;
1518 
1519  /* Ring (to alert incoming call) */
1520  name = pj_str("ring");
1521  status = pjmedia_tonegen_create2(app_config.pool, &name,
1522  app_config.media_cfg.clock_rate,
1523  app_config.media_cfg.channel_count,
1524  samples_per_frame,
1525  16, PJMEDIA_TONEGEN_LOOP,
1526  &app_config.ring_port);
1527  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS)
1528  goto on_error;
1529 
1530  for (i=0; i<RING_CNT; ++i) {
1531  tone[i].freq1 = RING_FREQ1;
1532  tone[i].freq2 = RING_FREQ2;
1533  tone[i].on_msec = RING_ON;
1534  tone[i].off_msec = RING_OFF;
1535  }
1536  tone[RING_CNT-1].off_msec = RING_INTERVAL;
1537 
1538  pjmedia_tonegen_play(app_config.ring_port, RING_CNT,
1539  tone, PJMEDIA_TONEGEN_LOOP);
1540 
1541  status = pjsua_conf_add_port(app_config.pool, app_config.ring_port,
1542  &app_config.ring_slot);
1543  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS)
1544  goto on_error;
1545 
1546  }
1547 
1548  /* Create AVI player virtual devices */
1549  if (app_config.avi_cnt) {
1550 #if PJMEDIA_HAS_VIDEO && PJMEDIA_VIDEO_DEV_HAS_AVI
1551  pjmedia_vid_dev_factory *avi_factory;
1552 
1553  status = pjmedia_avi_dev_create_factory(pjsua_get_pool_factory(),
1554  app_config.avi_cnt,
1555  &avi_factory);
1556  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
1557  PJ_PERROR(1,(THIS_FILE, status, "Error creating AVI factory"));
1558  goto on_error;
1559  }
1560 
1561  for (i=0; i<app_config.avi_cnt; ++i) {
1562  pjmedia_avi_dev_param avdp;
1563  pjmedia_vid_dev_index avid;
1564  unsigned strm_idx, strm_cnt;
1565 
1566  app_config.avi[i].dev_id = PJMEDIA_VID_INVALID_DEV;
1567  app_config.avi[i].slot = PJSUA_INVALID_ID;
1568 
1569  pjmedia_avi_dev_param_default(&avdp);
1570  avdp.path = app_config.avi[i].path;
1571 
1572  status = pjmedia_avi_dev_alloc(avi_factory, &avdp, &avid);
1573  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
1574  PJ_PERROR(1,(THIS_FILE, status,
1575  "Error creating AVI player for %.*s",
1576  (int)avdp.path.slen, avdp.path.ptr));
1577  goto on_error;
1578  }
1579 
1580  PJ_LOG(4,(THIS_FILE, "AVI player %.*s created, dev_id=%d",
1581  (int)avdp.title.slen, avdp.title.ptr, avid));
1582 
1583  app_config.avi[i].dev_id = avid;
1584  if (app_config.avi_def_idx == PJSUA_INVALID_ID)
1585  app_config.avi_def_idx = i;
1586 
1587  strm_cnt = pjmedia_avi_streams_get_num_streams(avdp.avi_streams);
1588  for (strm_idx=0; strm_idx<strm_cnt; ++strm_idx) {
1589  pjmedia_port *aud;
1590  pjmedia_format *fmt;
1591  pjsua_conf_port_id slot;
1592  char fmt_name[5];
1593 
1594  aud = pjmedia_avi_streams_get_stream(avdp.avi_streams,
1595  strm_idx);
1596  fmt = &aud->info.fmt;
1597 
1598  pjmedia_fourcc_name(fmt->id, fmt_name);
1599 
1600  if (fmt->id == PJMEDIA_FORMAT_PCM) {
1601  status = pjsua_conf_add_port(app_config.pool, aud,
1602  &slot);
1603  if (status == PJ_SUCCESS) {
1604  PJ_LOG(4,(THIS_FILE,
1605  "AVI %.*s: audio added to slot %d",
1606  (int)avdp.title.slen, avdp.title.ptr,
1607  slot));
1608  app_config.avi[i].slot = slot;
1609  }
1610  } else {
1611  PJ_LOG(4,(THIS_FILE,
1612  "AVI %.*s: audio ignored, format=%s",
1613  (int)avdp.title.slen, avdp.title.ptr,
1614  fmt_name));
1615  }
1616  }
1617  }
1618 #else
1619  PJ_LOG(2,(THIS_FILE,
1620  "Warning: --play-avi is ignored because AVI is disabled"));
1621 #endif /* PJMEDIA_VIDEO_DEV_HAS_AVI */
1622  }
1623 
1624  /* Add UDP transport unless it's disabled. */
1625  if (!app_config.no_udp) {
1626  pjsua_acc_id aid;
1627  pjsip_transport_type_e type = PJSIP_TRANSPORT_UDP;
1628 
1629  status = pjsua_transport_create(type,
1630  &app_config.udp_cfg,
1631  &transport_id);
1632  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS)
1633  goto on_error;
1634 
1635  /* Add local account */
1636  pjsua_acc_add_local(transport_id, PJ_TRUE, &aid);
1637 
1638  /* Adjust local account config based on pjsua app config */
1639  {
1640  pjsua_acc_config acc_cfg;
1641  pjsua_acc_get_config(aid, tmp_pool, &acc_cfg);
1642 
1643  app_config_init_video(&acc_cfg);
1644  acc_cfg.rtp_cfg = app_config.rtp_cfg;
1645  pjsua_acc_modify(aid, &acc_cfg);
1646  }
1647 
1648  //pjsua_acc_set_transport(aid, transport_id);
1649  pjsua_acc_set_online_status(current_acc, PJ_TRUE);
1650 
1651  if (app_config.udp_cfg.port == 0) {
1652  pjsua_transport_info ti;
1653  pj_sockaddr_in *a;
1654 
1655  pjsua_transport_get_info(transport_id, &ti);
1656  a = (pj_sockaddr_in*)&ti.local_addr;
1657 
1658  tcp_cfg.port = pj_ntohs(a->sin_port);
1659  }
1660  }
1661 
1662  /* Add UDP IPv6 transport unless it's disabled. */
1663  if (!app_config.no_udp && app_config.ipv6) {
1664  pjsua_acc_id aid;
1665  pjsip_transport_type_e type = PJSIP_TRANSPORT_UDP6;
1666  pjsua_transport_config udp_cfg;
1667 
1668  udp_cfg = app_config.udp_cfg;
1669  if (udp_cfg.port == 0)
1670  udp_cfg.port = 5060;
1671  else
1672  udp_cfg.port += 10;
1673  status = pjsua_transport_create(type,
1674  &udp_cfg,
1675  &transport_id);
1676  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS)
1677  goto on_error;
1678 
1679  /* Add local account */
1680  pjsua_acc_add_local(transport_id, PJ_TRUE, &aid);
1681 
1682  /* Adjust local account config based on pjsua app config */
1683  {
1684  pjsua_acc_config acc_cfg;
1685  pjsua_acc_get_config(aid, tmp_pool, &acc_cfg);
1686 
1687  app_config_init_video(&acc_cfg);
1688  acc_cfg.rtp_cfg = app_config.rtp_cfg;
1689  acc_cfg.ipv6_media_use = PJSUA_IPV6_ENABLED;
1690  pjsua_acc_modify(aid, &acc_cfg);
1691  }
1692 
1693  //pjsua_acc_set_transport(aid, transport_id);
1694  pjsua_acc_set_online_status(current_acc, PJ_TRUE);
1695 
1696  if (app_config.udp_cfg.port == 0) {
1697  pjsua_transport_info ti;
1698 
1699  pjsua_transport_get_info(transport_id, &ti);
1700  tcp_cfg.port = pj_sockaddr_get_port(&ti.local_addr);
1701  }
1702  }
1703 
1704  /* Add TCP transport unless it's disabled */
1705  if (!app_config.no_tcp) {
1706  pjsua_acc_id aid;
1707 
1708  status = pjsua_transport_create(PJSIP_TRANSPORT_TCP,
1709  &tcp_cfg,
1710  &transport_id);
1711  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS)
1712  goto on_error;
1713 
1714  /* Add local account */
1715  pjsua_acc_add_local(transport_id, PJ_TRUE, &aid);
1716 
1717  /* Adjust local account config based on pjsua app config */
1718  {
1719  pjsua_acc_config acc_cfg;
1720  pjsua_acc_get_config(aid, tmp_pool, &acc_cfg);
1721 
1722  app_config_init_video(&acc_cfg);
1723  acc_cfg.rtp_cfg = app_config.rtp_cfg;
1724  pjsua_acc_modify(aid, &acc_cfg);
1725  }
1726 
1727  pjsua_acc_set_online_status(current_acc, PJ_TRUE);
1728 
1729  }
1730 
1731  /* Add TCP IPv6 transport unless it's disabled. */
1732  if (!app_config.no_tcp && app_config.ipv6) {
1733  pjsua_acc_id aid;
1734  pjsip_transport_type_e type = PJSIP_TRANSPORT_TCP6;
1735 
1736  tcp_cfg.port += 10;
1737 
1738  status = pjsua_transport_create(type,
1739  &tcp_cfg,
1740  &transport_id);
1741  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS)
1742  goto on_error;
1743 
1744  /* Add local account */
1745  pjsua_acc_add_local(transport_id, PJ_TRUE, &aid);
1746 
1747  /* Adjust local account config based on pjsua app config */
1748  {
1749  pjsua_acc_config acc_cfg;
1750  pjsua_acc_get_config(aid, tmp_pool, &acc_cfg);
1751 
1752  app_config_init_video(&acc_cfg);
1753  acc_cfg.rtp_cfg = app_config.rtp_cfg;
1754  acc_cfg.ipv6_media_use = PJSUA_IPV6_ENABLED;
1755  pjsua_acc_modify(aid, &acc_cfg);
1756  }
1757 
1758  //pjsua_acc_set_transport(aid, transport_id);
1759  pjsua_acc_set_online_status(current_acc, PJ_TRUE);
1760  }
1761 
1762 
1763 #if defined(PJSIP_HAS_TLS_TRANSPORT) && PJSIP_HAS_TLS_TRANSPORT!=0
1764  /* Add TLS transport when application wants one */
1765  if (app_config.use_tls) {
1766 
1767  pjsua_acc_id acc_id;
1768 
1769  /* Copy the QoS settings */
1770  tcp_cfg.tls_setting.qos_type = tcp_cfg.qos_type;
1771  pj_memcpy(&tcp_cfg.tls_setting.qos_params, &tcp_cfg.qos_params,
1772  sizeof(tcp_cfg.qos_params));
1773 
1774  /* Set TLS port as TCP port+1 */
1775  tcp_cfg.port++;
1776  status = pjsua_transport_create(PJSIP_TRANSPORT_TLS,
1777  &tcp_cfg,
1778  &transport_id);
1779  tcp_cfg.port--;
1780  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS)
1781  goto on_error;
1782 
1783  /* Add local account */
1784  pjsua_acc_add_local(transport_id, PJ_FALSE, &acc_id);
1785 
1786  /* Adjust local account config based on pjsua app config */
1787  {
1788  pjsua_acc_config acc_cfg;
1789  pjsua_acc_get_config(acc_id, tmp_pool, &acc_cfg);
1790 
1791  app_config_init_video(&acc_cfg);
1792  acc_cfg.rtp_cfg = app_config.rtp_cfg;
1793  pjsua_acc_modify(acc_id, &acc_cfg);
1794  }
1795 
1796  pjsua_acc_set_online_status(acc_id, PJ_TRUE);
1797  }
1798 
1799  /* Add TLS IPv6 transport unless it's disabled. */
1800  if (app_config.use_tls && app_config.ipv6) {
1801  pjsua_acc_id aid;
1802  pjsip_transport_type_e type = PJSIP_TRANSPORT_TLS6;
1803 
1804  tcp_cfg.port += 10;
1805 
1806  status = pjsua_transport_create(type,
1807  &tcp_cfg,
1808  &transport_id);
1809  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS)
1810  goto on_error;
1811 
1812  /* Add local account */
1813  pjsua_acc_add_local(transport_id, PJ_TRUE, &aid);
1814 
1815  /* Adjust local account config based on pjsua app config */
1816  {
1817  pjsua_acc_config acc_cfg;
1818  pjsua_acc_get_config(aid, tmp_pool, &acc_cfg);
1819 
1820  app_config_init_video(&acc_cfg);
1821  acc_cfg.rtp_cfg = app_config.rtp_cfg;
1822  acc_cfg.ipv6_media_use = PJSUA_IPV6_ENABLED;
1823  pjsua_acc_modify(aid, &acc_cfg);
1824  }
1825 
1826  //pjsua_acc_set_transport(aid, transport_id);
1827  pjsua_acc_set_online_status(current_acc, PJ_TRUE);
1828  }
1829 
1830 #endif
1831 
1832  if (transport_id == -1) {
1833  PJ_LOG(1,(THIS_FILE, "Error: no transport is configured"));
1834  status = -1;
1835  goto on_error;
1836  }
1837 
1838 
1839  /* Add accounts */
1840  for (i=0; i<app_config.acc_cnt; ++i) {
1841  app_config.acc_cfg[i].rtp_cfg = app_config.rtp_cfg;
1842  app_config.acc_cfg[i].reg_retry_interval = 300;
1843  app_config.acc_cfg[i].reg_first_retry_interval = 60;
1844 
1845  app_config_init_video(&app_config.acc_cfg[i]);
1846 
1847  status = pjsua_acc_add(&app_config.acc_cfg[i], PJ_TRUE, NULL);
1848  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS)
1849  goto on_error;
1850  pjsua_acc_set_online_status(current_acc, PJ_TRUE);
1851  }
1852 
1853  /* Add buddies */
1854  for (i=0; i<app_config.buddy_cnt; ++i) {
1855  status = pjsua_buddy_add(&app_config.buddy_cfg[i], NULL);
1856  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
1857  PJ_PERROR(1,(THIS_FILE, status, "Error adding buddy"));
1858  goto on_error;
1859  }
1860  }
1861 
1862  /* Optionally disable some codec */
1863  for (i=0; i<app_config.codec_dis_cnt; ++i) {
1864  pjsua_codec_set_priority(&app_config.codec_dis[i],
1865  PJMEDIA_CODEC_PRIO_DISABLED);
1866 #if PJSUA_HAS_VIDEO
1867  pjsua_vid_codec_set_priority(&app_config.codec_dis[i],
1868  PJMEDIA_CODEC_PRIO_DISABLED);
1869 #endif
1870  }
1871 
1872  /* Optionally set codec orders */
1873  for (i=0; i<app_config.codec_cnt; ++i) {
1874  pjsua_codec_set_priority(&app_config.codec_arg[i],
1875  (pj_uint8_t)(PJMEDIA_CODEC_PRIO_NORMAL+i+9));
1876 #if PJSUA_HAS_VIDEO
1877  pjsua_vid_codec_set_priority(&app_config.codec_arg[i],
1878  (pj_uint8_t)(PJMEDIA_CODEC_PRIO_NORMAL+i+9));
1879 #endif
1880  }
1881 
1882  /* Use null sound device? */
1883 #ifndef STEREO_DEMO
1884  if (app_config.null_audio) {
1885  status = pjsua_set_null_snd_dev();
1886  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS)
1887  return status;
1888  }
1889 #endif
1890 
1891  if (app_config.capture_dev != PJSUA_INVALID_ID ||
1892  app_config.playback_dev != PJSUA_INVALID_ID)
1893  {
1894  status = pjsua_set_snd_dev(app_config.capture_dev,
1895  app_config.playback_dev);
1896  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS)
1897  goto on_error;
1898  }
1899 
1900  /* Init call setting */
1901  pjsua_call_setting_default(&call_opt);
1902  call_opt.aud_cnt = app_config.aud_cnt;
1903  call_opt.vid_cnt = app_config.vid.vid_cnt;
1904 
1905  pj_pool_release(tmp_pool);
1906  return PJ_SUCCESS;
1907 
1908 on_error:
1909  pj_pool_release(tmp_pool);
1910  app_destroy();
1911  return status;
1912 }
1913 
1914 pj_status_t pjsua_app_init(const pjsua_app_cfg_t *cfg)
1915 {
1916  pj_status_t status;
1917  pj_memcpy(&app_cfg, cfg, sizeof(app_cfg));
1918 
1919  status = app_init();
1920  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS)
1921  return status;
1922 
1923  /* Init CLI if configured */
1924  if (app_config.use_cli) {
1925  status = cli_init();
1926  }
1927  return status;
1928 }
1929 
1930 pj_status_t pjsua_app_run(pj_bool_t wait_telnet_cli)
1931 {
1932  pj_thread_t *stdout_refresh_thread = NULL;
1933  pj_status_t status;
1934 
1935  /* Start console refresh thread */
1936  if (stdout_refresh > 0) {
1937  pj_thread_create(app_config.pool, "stdout", &stdout_refresh_proc,
1938  NULL, 0, 0, &stdout_refresh_thread);
1939  }
1940 
1941  status = pjsua_start();
1942  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS)
1943  goto on_return;
1944 
1945  if (app_config.use_cli && (app_config.cli_cfg.cli_fe & CLI_FE_TELNET)) {
1946  char info[128];
1947  cli_get_info(info, sizeof(info));
1948  if (app_cfg.on_started) {
1949  (*app_cfg.on_started)(status, info);
1950  }
1951  } else {
1952  if (app_cfg.on_started) {
1953  (*app_cfg.on_started)(status, "Ready");
1954  }
1955  }
1956 
1957  /* If user specifies URI to call, then call the URI */
1958  if (uri_arg.slen) {
1959  pjsua_call_setting_default(&call_opt);
1960  call_opt.aud_cnt = app_config.aud_cnt;
1961  call_opt.vid_cnt = app_config.vid.vid_cnt;
1962 
1963  pjsua_call_make_call(current_acc, &uri_arg, &call_opt, NULL,
1964  NULL, NULL);
1965  }
1966 
1967  app_running = PJ_TRUE;
1968 
1969  if (app_config.use_cli)
1970  cli_main(wait_telnet_cli);
1971  else
1972  legacy_main();
1973 
1974  status = PJ_SUCCESS;
1975 
1976 on_return:
1977  if (stdout_refresh_thread) {
1978  stdout_refresh_quit = PJ_TRUE;
1979  pj_thread_join(stdout_refresh_thread);
1980  pj_thread_destroy(stdout_refresh_thread);
1981  stdout_refresh_quit = PJ_FALSE;
1982  }
1983  return status;
1984 }
1985 
1986 static pj_status_t app_destroy()
1987 {
1988  pj_status_t status = PJ_SUCCESS;
1989  unsigned i;
1990  pj_bool_t use_cli = PJ_FALSE;
1991  int cli_fe = 0;
1992  pj_uint16_t cli_telnet_port = 0;
1993 
1994 #ifdef STEREO_DEMO
1995  if (app_config.snd) {
1996  pjmedia_snd_port_destroy(app_config.snd);
1997  app_config.snd = NULL;
1998  }
1999  if (app_config.sc_ch1) {
2000  pjsua_conf_remove_port(app_config.sc_ch1_slot);
2001  app_config.sc_ch1_slot = PJSUA_INVALID_ID;
2002  pjmedia_port_destroy(app_config.sc_ch1);
2003  app_config.sc_ch1 = NULL;
2004  }
2005  if (app_config.sc) {
2006  pjmedia_port_destroy(app_config.sc);
2007  app_config.sc = NULL;
2008  }
2009 #endif
2010 
2011  /* Close avi devs and ports */
2012  for (i=0; i<app_config.avi_cnt; ++i) {
2013  if (app_config.avi[i].slot != PJSUA_INVALID_ID)
2014  pjsua_conf_remove_port(app_config.avi[i].slot);
2015 #if PJMEDIA_HAS_VIDEO && PJMEDIA_VIDEO_DEV_HAS_AVI
2016  if (app_config.avi[i].dev_id != PJMEDIA_VID_INVALID_DEV)
2017  pjmedia_avi_dev_free(app_config.avi[i].dev_id);
2018 #endif
2019  }
2020 
2021  /* Close ringback port */
2022  if (app_config.ringback_port &&
2023  app_config.ringback_slot != PJSUA_INVALID_ID)
2024  {
2025  pjsua_conf_remove_port(app_config.ringback_slot);
2026  app_config.ringback_slot = PJSUA_INVALID_ID;
2027  pjmedia_port_destroy(app_config.ringback_port);
2028  app_config.ringback_port = NULL;
2029  }
2030 
2031  /* Close ring port */
2032  if (app_config.ring_port && app_config.ring_slot != PJSUA_INVALID_ID) {
2033  pjsua_conf_remove_port(app_config.ring_slot);
2034  app_config.ring_slot = PJSUA_INVALID_ID;
2035  pjmedia_port_destroy(app_config.ring_port);
2036  app_config.ring_port = NULL;
2037  }
2038 
2039  /* Close tone generators */
2040  for (i=0; i<app_config.tone_count; ++i) {
2041  pjsua_conf_remove_port(app_config.tone_slots[i]);
2042  }
2043 
2044  pj_pool_safe_release(&app_config.pool);
2045 
2046  status = pjsua_destroy();
2047 
2048  if (app_config.use_cli) {
2049  use_cli = app_config.use_cli;
2050  cli_fe = app_config.cli_cfg.cli_fe;
2051  cli_telnet_port = app_config.cli_cfg.telnet_cfg.port;
2052  }
2053 
2054  /* Reset config */
2055  pj_bzero(&app_config, sizeof(app_config));
2056 
2057  if (use_cli) {
2058  app_config.use_cli = use_cli;
2059  app_config.cli_cfg.cli_fe = cli_fe;
2060  app_config.cli_cfg.telnet_cfg.port = cli_telnet_port;
2061  }
2062 
2063  return status;
2064 }
2065 
2066 pj_status_t pjsua_app_destroy()
2067 {
2068  pj_status_t status;
2069 
2070  status = app_destroy();
2071 
2072  if (app_config.use_cli) {
2073  cli_destroy();
2074  }
2075 
2076  return status;
2077 }
2078 
2081 #ifdef STEREO_DEMO
2082 /*
2083  * In this stereo demo, we open the sound device in stereo mode and
2084  * arrange the attachment to the PJSUA-LIB conference bridge as such
2085  * so that channel0/left channel of the sound device corresponds to
2086  * slot 0 in the bridge, and channel1/right channel of the sound
2087  * device corresponds to slot 1 in the bridge. Then user can independently
2088  * feed different media to/from the speakers/microphones channels, by
2089  * connecting them to slot 0 or 1 respectively.
2090  *
2091  * Here's how the connection looks like:
2092  *
2093  +-----------+ stereo +-----------------+ 2x mono +-----------+
2094  | AUDIO DEV |<------>| SPLITCOMB left|<------->|#0 BRIDGE |
2095  +-----------+ | right|<------->|#1 |
2096  +-----------------+ +-----------+
2097  */
2098 static void stereo_demo()
2099 {
2100  pjmedia_port *conf;
2101  pj_status_t status;
2102 
2103  /* Disable existing sound device */
2104  conf = pjsua_set_no_snd_dev();
2105 
2106  /* Create stereo-mono splitter/combiner */
2107  status = pjmedia_splitcomb_create(app_config.pool,
2108  PJMEDIA_PIA_SRATE(&conf->info) /* clock rate */,
2109  2 /* stereo */,
2110  2 * PJMEDIA_PIA_SPF(&conf->info),
2111  PJMEDIA_PIA_BITS(&conf->info),
2112  0 /* options */,
2113  &app_config.sc);
2114  pj_assert(status == PJ_SUCCESS);
2115 
2116  /* Connect channel0 (left channel?) to conference port slot0 */
2117  status = pjmedia_splitcomb_set_channel(app_config.sc, 0 /* ch0 */,
2118  0 /*options*/,
2119  conf);
2120  pj_assert(status == PJ_SUCCESS);
2121 
2122  /* Create reverse channel for channel1 (right channel?)... */
2123  status = pjmedia_splitcomb_create_rev_channel(app_config.pool,
2124  app_config.sc,
2125  1 /* ch1 */,
2126  0 /* options */,
2127  &app_config.sc_ch1);
2128  pj_assert(status == PJ_SUCCESS);
2129 
2130  /* .. and register it to conference bridge (it would be slot1
2131  * if there's no other devices connected to the bridge)
2132  */
2133  status = pjsua_conf_add_port(app_config.pool, app_config.sc_ch1,
2134  &app_config.sc_ch1_slot);
2135  pj_assert(status == PJ_SUCCESS);
2136 
2137  /* Create sound device */
2138  status = pjmedia_snd_port_create(app_config.pool, -1, -1,
2139  PJMEDIA_PIA_SRATE(&conf->info),
2140  2 /* stereo */,
2141  2 * PJMEDIA_PIA_SPF(&conf->info),
2142  PJMEDIA_PIA_BITS(&conf->info),
2143  0, &app_config.snd);
2144 
2145  pj_assert(status == PJ_SUCCESS);
2146 
2147 
2148  /* Connect the splitter to the sound device */
2149  status = pjmedia_snd_port_connect(app_config.snd, app_config.sc);
2150  pj_assert(status == PJ_SUCCESS);
2151 }
2152 #endif
